item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving Everyone! This Holiday Season let's Join Together to be Thankful for our Furry Best Friends. Sunday November 18th from 11am-1pm we will have Fun Games & Activities to Shower our Pooches with Attention! Our silly pups can try a game of Duck Duck Turkey, Pilgrim Paw Painting, or Harvest the Corn. Hope to see you all then!
We are also accepting donations of gently used pet supplies, bag or canned food & treats to help local pet shelters brighten the holidays of pets less fortunate than ours.
Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Thanksgiving Celebration!
